universum.studios.android.ui.widget

Interface Scrollable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Pullable, Refreshable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GridViewWidget, HorizontalScrollViewWidget, ListViewWidget, RecyclerViewWidget, ScrollViewWidget, WebViewWidget

    public interface Scrollable
    Interface for scrollable views.
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getOrientation()
      Returns the orientation of this scrollable view to determine how, along which axis, can be this view (its content) scrolled.
      boolean isScrolledAtEnd()
      Returns boolean flag indicating whether this scrollable view (its content) is scrolled at the end or not.
      boolean isScrolledAtStart()
      Returns boolean flag indicating whether this scrollable view (its content) is scrolled at the start or not.

    • Method Detail

      • getOrientation

        int getOrientation()
        Returns the orientation of this scrollable view to determine how, along which axis, can be this view (its content) scrolled.
        Returns:
        Orientation of this view. One of Orientation.VERTICAL or Orientation.HORIZONTAL.

      • isScrolledAtStart

        boolean isScrolledAtStart()
        Returns boolean flag indicating whether this scrollable view (its content) is scrolled at the start or not.
        Returns:
        True if content of this view is scrolled at the start of this view, false otherwise.

      • isScrolledAtEnd

        boolean isScrolledAtEnd()
        Returns boolean flag indicating whether this scrollable view (its content) is scrolled at the end or not.
        Returns:
        True if content of this view is scrolled at the end of this view, false otherwise.
